segments.text: Say , Jim , how about going for a few beers after dinner ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know that is tempting but is really not good for our fitness .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you mean ? It will help us to relax .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you really think so ? I don't . It will just make us fat and act silly . Remember last time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess you are right . But what shall we do ? I don't feel like sitting at home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I suggest a walk over to the gym where we can play singsong and meet some of our friends .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a good idea . I hear Mary and Sally often go there to play singsong . Perhaps we can make a foursome with them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds great to me ! If they are willing , we could ask them to go dancing with us . That is excellent exercise and fun , too .
segments.speaker: S2
